author: @helensung3526
text:
如果我沒有了你 我到底該怎麼辦
走了這麼遠 有你在身邊 我很喜歡
如果我沒有了你 我到底該怎麼辦 Yeh
會不會忘記我們的回憶或是想起每天 Yeh

Baby 我會在斜陽下微笑
隨時等待疲憊的你
我想你也會懂 我們一起做過的夢

Tell me right now Tell me right now
閉上雙眼 說真心話
每天對你牽掛 每天都放不下
其實我也會害怕

不要離開
留下來我的愛
有你的地方是溫馨港灣 (Oh baby)
有你會讓我變更勇敢
不管怎樣 我都會竭盡全力
需要的時候陪在你身邊
只要你不介意的話

Cuz I'm Your Home Home Home Home
Cuz I'm Your Home Home Home Home
Cuz I'm Your Home Home Home Home
可以哭泣的地方 可以流淚的地方

慢慢走遠 慢慢發現
我們之間消失的地平線
漸漸回首 才漸漸發現 從未改變

當你感覺累了 記得身邊有我
希望你每時每刻都能一直快快樂樂
就算以後有什麼困難我替你去面對
珍惜現在不想等到失去再後悔

有你會讓我變更勇敢
不管怎樣 我都會竭盡全力
需要的時候陪在你身邊
只要你不介意的話

不想放手的我們 相互依偎的我們

你定格的幸福
那是我停留的腳步

author: @sonalisamal2009
text: I've no idea about Mandarin, but going by the comments of native speakers, I can tell they have perfectly done it, almost as if they were native speakers themselves. Jun and The8 have really helped them very well with the pronunciations and the other members have really put in their everything and done a great job. The dedication definitely shows. Even for Dar+ling, you almost can't tell all of them don't speak English that regularly. It was amazing and definitely one of the best pronunciations from non English speakers. It definitely showed the efforts they made ❤

scoups, mingyu, dk, vernon, dino

author: @abimon76
text:
As a native speaker, in Oh My era, the non-Chinese members with best Chinese pronunciation were Seungkwan, Dino, Mingyu and Vernon.
In Home era, the non-Chinese members who improved their pronunciation a WHOLE lot were Jeonghan, Joshua, Wonwoo and Woozi.
When I first heard Vernon rap and sing in Chinese, I was shocked because he sounds so natural and sounds as fluent as native Chinese rappers. Seungkwan seems to work very hard to perfect his Chinese and also Japanese accent so he sounds amazinggg in the end. Dino and Mingyu have great pronunciation because they sound very clear and their pinyin is really accurate as well.

This time, Jeonghan and Joshua sound much clearer and more confident in their pinyin. Woozi and Wonwoo sound like native speakers even. 
If I were to name members that sound like native Chinese speakers, they would be Vernon, Woozi and Seungkwan. It's amazing.

author: @selina7468
text: Amo a los miembros, amo la coreografía, amo la canción, amo la letra, amo el ritmo, amo las voces, amo el vestuarios, amo el escenario, amo los peinados, amo esas miradas, esos gestos, amo el sentimiento que transmite la canción, de verdad es que me pongo a bailar como si no hubiera mañana. Os amo. Sois increíbles con un talento fuera de este mundo. Y sobre todo amo como os preocupais por vuestros fans, como hacéis los videos lo más entretenido posible, me encanta vuestra relación, como os lleváis, lo autodidactas que sois, el como sacáis canciones en versiones chinas,japonés y coreanas. Os amo, y gracias por tantos años ♥️

author: @christabel0698
text:
I am a Cantonese, and I would say they nailed it, they almost don't have any accent when they pronounce the words, I can clearly know what the lyrics are by just hearing once, and this is very amazing compared to other groups who made Chinese ver. songs. 
Wonwoo, Woozi and Hoshi nailed it very well, they literally are singing like native Chinese speakers. 
My bias are exactly the three of them, and I am proud of them, great thanks to Jun and Minghao on guiding them to pronounce perfectly ㅠㅠ

author: @maymunahuq6238
text:
CARATS we are seen as a lazy fandom, so now we need to show them we aren’t. Vote on Mama, Billboard, Idolchampion, and everything or anything. Also let’s stream Home;Run and semicolon. We said we would get 50 million in just a week, but we haven’t even gotten it to 40 million and it’s been a month. I want the members to see the love and support we have for them, even more than we are showing them. And if possible even stream all the other music videos. We haven’t gotten “very nice” “manse” “adore u” “clap” “fear” “hit” “oh my” or “left and right” at 100 million yet and we said we would. There is so much more mv that I know we can get on top. And let’s even get dwc to 200 million. I know we can do it because I see the huge amount of love the boys get each and every day. Seventeen are the 2nd biggest bg rn, so let’s show everyone else the amazing music and content Seventeen give us.  

Ps. This wasn’t meant to offend anyone in any way. I love so many groups, but I see that Seventeen don’t get the recognized they deserve. And yes I know they got an award recognized by the president of sk, so let’s show everyone why they got the award for changing the culture and arts.

author: @shin4839
text:
How to stream when you have a wifi?

1. Make a list of what we need to stream. 
2. Playlist on youtube, spotify.
3. Loop
4. Play it when you're free or cleaning, washing, reviewing, bored, focus on each member, memorize the song, the dance, the angle of their faces, how their hair moves, count the screen time of each member, appreciate the visual, vocal and the choreography. And last, make your final decision of which bias are you.
5. Repeat again.

STREAMING IS EASY WHEN YOU HAVE WIFI. PERIOD. PERIODISM. PERIODIC. PERIODICAL.

author: @kpopmutlix4651
text:
I’m Chinese and the members tried their best to sing this.
Imma list the top5 members that rocked the Chinese version(Excluding Minghao and Jun obviously)
1.Wonwoo
Wow, he perfectly sang it without any accent. During his part I thought Minghao or Jun took his part, but no
2.Jeonghan 
He rocked it. It sounded perfect with his sweet and soft voice.
3.Joshua/Vernon
I couldn’t choose among these two, but honestly they both rocked it. The words were sang beautifully, and I had no issues understanding what they were saying along with their accent.

All the members did a great job of trying to sing this so with a language they probably didn’t understand to the extent, and this song is honestly good with whatever language. Stan Seventeen

author: @xxmilktaexx6169
text:
i just started getting into kpop like around summer last year. it started w a reaction video by one of my fav youtubers. they reacted to bts (my first kpop + ult group) and you know the story of a kpop fan: "i juST wAnT tO kNOw thEiR nAMeS" and only recently, i found dwc. I've listened to highlight around september 2019 but never rly paid attention to who actually produced the song (svt). and then dwc popped up in my recommended and i wanted to find another group and branch out into a multifandom fan. and im so glad i did. I must say that svt hasnt rly helped me overcome things like bts has, but im still super grateful. im only a baby carat and i hope carats welcome me into the fandom 😊

author: @fuu16
text:
以下是準確的發音(⁎⁍̴̛ᴗ⁍̴̛⁎)
Coups「你 定格的幸福」(準到很嚇人)
淨漢「如果我沒有了你」
Hoshi「有你的地方是溫馨港灣」(高音部分)
Woozi「不要離開 留下來我的愛」和「不管怎樣 我都會竭盡全力」
DK「支離破碎的節奏 不是我想要的生活」
Dino「閉上雙眼 說真心話」
Joshua「走了這麼遠 有你在身邊 我很喜歡」和「可以哭泣的地方 可以流淚的地方」(第一句很準確)
Vernon「每天對你牽掛 每天都放不下」和「當你感覺累了 記得身邊有我 希望你每時每刻都能一直快快樂樂」(幾乎是全部了吧)
Wonwoo「慢慢走遠 慢慢發現 我們之間消失的地平線」
勝寬「需要的時候 陪在你身邊 只要你不介意的話」和「不想放手的我們 相互依偎的我們」
以上—————
Mingyu我找不到比較準確的音啊啊இдஇ
雖然我儘量把大家都打出來了(怕有人說我偏心）
但是我不想昧著良心說發音準確 抱歉！
聽了好幾遍 如果有異議或是還有其他準確的發音可以下面回覆哦(๑>ᴗ<๑)

author: @pinkluv
text: I sort of expected their Chinese to be kind of terrible but I was genuinely surprised that it was great. Most Kpop groups are not able to pronounce most of Chinese words (not degrading them or anything – I definitely understand that it is not their first  language). The pronounciations were rarely off, and even if so, it wasn't at the level that it hindered my understanding. The Chinese members' singing were very pleasing to hear. Great version in my opinion.

author: @woonshuqi8727
text:
如果我没有了你 我到底该怎么办
走了这么远 有你在身边 我很喜欢

如果我没有了你 我到底该怎么办 Yeh
会不会忘记我们的回忆或是想起
每天 Yeh

Baby 我会在斜阳下微笑
随时等待疲惫的你
我想你也会懂 我们一起做过的梦

Tell me right now Tell me right now
闭上双眼 说真心话
每天对你牵挂 每天都放不下
其实我也会害怕

不要离开
留下来我的爱
有你的地方是温馨港湾 (Oh baby)
有你会让我变更勇敢
不管怎样 我都会竭尽全力
需要的时候陪在你身边
只要你不介意的话

Cuz I’m Your Home Home Home Home
Cuz I’m Your Home Home Home Home
Cuz I’m Your Home Home Home Home
可以哭泣的地方 可以流泪的地方

慢慢走远 慢慢发现
我们之间消失的地平线
渐渐回首 才渐渐发现 从未改变

当你感觉累了 记得身边有我
希望你每时每刻都能一直 快快乐乐
就算以后有什么困难我替你去面对
珍惜现在不想等到失去再后悔

Tell me right now Tell me right now
闭上双眼 说真心话
每天对你牵挂（对你牵挂）
每天都放不下（都放不下）
其实我也会害怕

不要离开
留下来我的爱
有你的地方是温馨港湾 (Oh baby)
有你会让我变更勇敢
不管怎样 我都会竭尽全力
需要的时候陪在你身边
只要你不介意的话

不想放手的我们 相互依偎的我们
支离破碎的节奏 不是我想要的生活
你定格的幸福
那是我停留的脚步

Cuz I’m Your Home Home Home Home
Cuz I’m Your Home Home Home Home
Because You’re my Home Home Home Home
可以哭泣的地方 可以流泪的地方

Mereka kagak isa bahasa Indonesia kenapa pada minta dibuatno versi Indonesia.. 
Bahasa Indonesia itu meskipun kayaknya gampang tapi menurut mereka yg baru belajar itu susah buat bisa plek aksennya kayak orang Indonesia.. 
Banyak orang Korea yg belajar bahasa tapi ya gitu aksennya gak kayak orang Indonesia asli.. 
Dan juga netijen indo itu kejam cuma artis yg mukanya gedhek aja yg sanggup menghadapi netijen indo.. 
Jadi kagak usah minta yg aneh-aneh lah syukuri apa yg ada gak usah minta lebih..

author: @JaeHee
text: Their chinese pronunciations was *PERFECT* ! Especially WONWOO WOOZI JOSHUA JEONGHAN I MEAN....  ALL!  All of the kpop song with chinese ver. always sound kind of weird for me but *THIS* *IS* *SOOOOO* *GOOD* . 听着你们用我最熟悉的语言唱歌，发音还这么好，真的很感动！通常很多中文版都因为发音很奇怪､不自然，让人比起歌曲，更加在意歌词，但这次我居然很享受整首歌，谢谢你们的努力！谢谢你们对我们的用心💕💕  발음이 너무 좋아서 감동이다 ㅠㅠ 열심히 하는거 티가 나요 진짜 ㅠ  중국어 발음은 워낙 어려운데 이렇게 잘 해줘서 너무 고맙고 사랑해요 💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕

다른나라 언어로 불러도 뮤비는 그대로에 음원만 입히는게 훨씬 편할텐데... 세븐틴 당신들은 중국어버전도 찍다니..당신들 대체..


귀찮아서 안적어놨던건데 다른 가수분들도 그 나라 버전으로 뮤비 찍으시는 분들도 계셔요!
컴백하기에도 바쁠때 외국어버전으로 가사 암기, 녹음, 뮤비 촬영까지 하는건 귀찮기도 하고 힘든부분이기 때문에 이 댓글을 적은거고 다른가수들도 다 하는건데 왜이렇게 유난이냐 하시는분들은 그냥 돌아가주세요 제 눈에는 제가 응원하는 가수가 제일 예뻐보일수밖에 없으니깐요

text:
Seventeen Home lyrics Korean 세븐틴 홈 한국어 가사 Seventeen Home letra coreano

정한: 내가 뭘 어쩌겠어 나는 너가 없으면 
조슈아: 낡은로봇처럼 맘이 멈추고 늘 차가워 
우지: 우린 뭘 어쩌겠어 나는 너가 없으면 yeah yeah 
에스쿱스: 나랑 똑같이 힘들텐데 뭘 어쩌겠어 우리 yeah
호시: baby우리의 따뜻함을 그대로 간직하고싶어
디에잇: 어떤 누구라도 우리 사이 풀지 못해서
디노: tell me 나의 너 tell me 나의 너 말좀 해줘 내 안에서 
버논: 난 네 마음안에서 발버둥 치고 있어
민규: 덜컥 겁이 나는걸
우지: 어쩌겠어 나는 너가 없으면 
호시: 내 마음 편히 기댈 곳이 없어 
준: 내 속은 너를 위해 비어있어 
도겸: 어찌 보면 조금 어렵겠지만 
승관: 언제라도 난 여기 서 있어 편하게 생각해도 돼
도겸: cause I’m your home home home home 
호시: cu’z I’m your home home home

조슈아: cause I’m your home home home 
정한: 니가 울수있는곳 니가 올수있는곳
원우:이미나는 너의 맘을 앞지른거 같아 지금은 
디에잇: 그렇다고 나 맘이 작다는게 아냐
버논: 밖은 여전히 추워 시린 코끝은 더 우리를 멀리서도 하는 추억 
민규:네마음에  구멍 나면 두손으로 막아 주면 돼 빈손이라도 내밀어 줘 내가 채울께

승과,에스쿱스: 덜컥 겁이 나는걸

에스쿠바가:나는 너에게 있을 곳

author: @vl8518
text: I speak fluent Chinese and I think they did a really excellent job esp Jeonghan and Joshua (and of course Minghao and Jun)! Chinese is a tonal language so the same syllables can be pronounced in different tones and have a different meaning. So when words are stretched out to match the beat of a song, it can be a bit difficult to understand (not just for Home but for a lot of other songs as well). But for the most part I did understand what they were saying without needing a translation and thats super impressive considering Chinese is a native tongue only to two of the members.

(hui bu hui wang ji wo men de hui yi huo shi xiang qi mei tian yeah)

(Baby wo hui zai xie yang xia wei xiao sui shi deng dai pi bei de ni)

(wo xiang ni ye hui dong wo men yi qi zuo guo de meng)

Tell me right now

(bi shang shuang yan shuo zhen xin hua)

(you ni hui rang wo bian geng yong gan)
不管怎样 我都会竭尽全力
(bu guan zen yang wo dou hui jie jin quan li)
需要的时候陪在你身边 只要你不介意的话
(xu yao de shi hou pei zai ni shen bian zhi yao ni bu jie yi de hua)

Cause I'm your home...
Cause I'm your home...
Cause I'm your home...
可以哭泣的地方 可以流泪的地方
(ke yi ku qi de di fang ke yi liu lei de di fang)

慢慢走远 慢慢发现
(man man zou yuan man man fa xian)
我们之间消失的地平线
(wo men zhi jian xiao shi de di ping xian)
渐渐回首 才渐渐发现 从未改变
(jian jian hui shou cai jian jian fa xian cong wei gai bian)
Yeah 当你感觉累了 记得身边有我
(Yeah dang ni gan jue lei le ji de shen bian you wo)
希望你每时每刻都能一直快快乐乐
(xi wang ni mei shi mei ke dou neng yi zhi kuai kuai le le)
就算你有什么困难我陪你去面对
(jiu suan ni you shen me kun nan wo pei ni qu mian dui)
珍惜现在不想等到失去再后悔
(zhen xi xian zai bu xiang deng dao shi qu zai hou hui)

Tell me right now
Tell me right now
闭上双眼 说真心话
(bi shang shuang yan shuo zhen xin hua)
每天对你牵挂 每天都放不下
(mei tian dui ni qian gua mei tian dou fang bu xia)
其实我也会害怕
(qi shi wo ye hui hai pa)

不要离开 留下来我的爱
(bu yao li kai liu xia lai wo de ai)
有你的地方是温馨港湾 
(you ni de di fang shi wen xin gang wan)
有你会让我变更勇敢
(you ni hui rang wo bian geng yong gan)
不管怎样 我会竭尽全力
(bu guan zen yang wo dou hui jie Jin quan li)
需要的时候陪在你身边 只要你不介意的话
(xu yao de shi hou pei zai ni shen bian zhi yao ni bu jie yi de hua)

不想放手的我们 相互依偎的我们
(bu xiang fang shou de wo men xiang hu yi wei de wo men)
支离破碎的节奏 不是我想要的生活
(zhi li po sui de jie zou bu shi wo xiang yao de sheng huo)
你定格的幸福 那是我停留的脚步
(ni ding ge de xing fu na shi wo ting liu de jiao bu)

Cause I'm your home...
Cause I'm your home...
Because you're my home...
可以哭泣的地方 可以流泪的地方
(ke yi ku qi de di fang ke yi liu lei de di fang)

突然间很想打歌词XD 如果有错的话请纠正我哦^_^
Ps: Their pronounciation are damn good, they really improved a lot 💙

author: @kyeli_ng
text:
真心觉得HOME 中文版，
As a Malaysian chinese carat myself, to be very honest, 
。
。

。

。
歌词很暖，而且mv还是另外拍摄，不是用回韩版的。
非常用心又暖心，谢谢小十七总是带给克拉那么多惊喜，总是那么爱着我们。 
身为克拉，觉得幸运。 

I really love this version of home. Their pronunciation, can't say that its 100% correct but enough for me to understand. 
the lyrics are very heartwarming and meaningful, makes me think that, What can i do as a carat to deserve such a song with these beautiful lyrics  from our boys? 
I can feel that the non-chinese members put in lots of hardwork to memorise and to get the lyrics correct. 
the moment that you can understand them , is the time where you feel the distance between you and them are nearer.  

想要一直这样下去，喜欢你们的同时，也追着自己的梦想，跟你们一起前进，进步。 
 谢谢你们总是在斜阳下微笑，等待着疲惫的我。
#190228 
#SEVENTEEN_Home

有你会让我变更勇敢

可以哭泣的地方 可以流泪的地方 

慢慢走远 慢慢发现
我们之间消失的地平线

hi!! new carat here, just wanted to share the translation for home’s chi lyrics bc there’re rly pretty 

CHINESE + TRANSLATED LYRICS
如果我没有了你 我到底该怎么办
if you’re gone, what do i do?

i think you’d know the dreams we dreamt together
tell me right now tell me right now

close your eyes and speak the truth

i care for you everyday, am always worried everyday 
其实我也会害怕
actually, i’m scared too 
不要离开 留下来我的爱
don’t go, stay with me and my love

how would i dare to forget the place with you?

with you here, i’m braver

i’ll always turn to you 
需要的时候飞向你身旁
if you need me, i’ll fly to your side 
只要你不介意等我
as long as you don’t mind waiting for me
cause i’m your home home home home 
cause i’m your home home home home 
cause i’m your home home home home
可以回去的地方 可以流泪的地方
a place where you can come back and cry 
慢慢走远 慢慢发现 我们之间消失的地平线
as we slowly progress, i slowly realise the distance between us has vanished 
渐渐挥手才渐渐发现从未改变
slowly waiving my hands, slowly realising nothing has changed 
yeah 当你感觉累了记得身边有我
when you feel tired, remember there’s a me beside you 
希望你每时每刻都能一直快快乐乐
pray that you’re happy everyday every moment 
就算没有又怎么(maga jumyeon dwae - i’m sorry i rly couldn’t figure this part out) 
even if there’s nothing
珍惜现在不想等到到时再后悔
i’d cherish you because i don’t wanna wait till i regret 
tell me right now tell me right now
闭上双眼 说真实话 
close your eyes and speak the truth 
每天对你牵挂 每天都放不下
i care for you everyday, am always worried everyday 
其实我也会害怕
actually, i’m scared too 
不要离开 留下来我的爱
don’t go, stay with me and my love 
有你的地方谁我谁敢忘 oh baby
how would i dare to forget the place with you? 
有你回来我变得勇敢
with you here, i’m braver
不管怎样 我都会站在这里
no matter what, i’ll stay here
需要的时候陪在你身旁
if you need it, i’ll be beside you 
只要你不介意等我
as long as you don’t mind waiting for me
不想放手的我们 想着一位的我们
i don’t wanna let go, i’m only thinking of you
千里不舍的牵手 不是我想要的生活
you reluctancy to hold my hand is something i don’t want to live with 
你定格的幸福 那是我定以的脚步
you’re definition of happiness is the direction of my footsteps 
cause i’m your home home home home
cause i’m your home home home home
because you’re my home home home home
